name: Dome Base 64 - Alien Edition (C64)
description:
A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

1 Player Arcade Style Push Scroll Shoot 'em Up, This time you are the Alien, Shoot Electric Acid Spit at the Humans and Gun Turrets, Walk into the Alien Eggs to save them.

2 Download Files, 1 for Normal Game with 4 Lives the other is a Cheat Mode with Infinite Lives, Choice is yours.

Made with Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Side Scroll Version by Jon Wells, Seuck framework Code and Music by Richard Bayliss.
